title: Mala-Spiced Smashed Potatoes
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
ingredients: - 2 to 3 Tbsp Mala Spice Mix (this page)
directions: 1. In a large pot over high heat, bring about 5 inches / 13cm of salted water to a boil. Add the potatoes and cook until they are soft. Small ones should take 20 to 25 minutes, and larger ones might take 30 minutes.

3. Drain the potatoes. Transfer to a baking sheet. Using a large fork or a potato masher, smash them while keeping them in one piece. Drizzle the butter over the potatoes, sprinkle with the salt and spice mix to taste.
4. Bake for about 40 minutes, until deep golden and crispy. Serve hot.
